name: Ojama Emperor
desc:
3 Beast monsters, including an "Ojama" monster
While "Ojama Country" is in a Field Zone, this card gains 3000 ATK, also it cannot be destroyed by card effects. Your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken from attacks on this card. You can target 1 "Ojama" non-Link Monster in your GY; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Fusion Monsters. You can only use this effect of "Ojama Emperor" once per turn.
